QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Swamp of Sorrows!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Trade Baron Silversnap at Bogpaddle.$B$BThe Alliance forces urgently needs the munitions provided by the baron! You must do whatever is necessary to convince the baron to keep selling our forces supplies at reasonable prices.$B$BTo get to the swamp, follow the road from the southeastern Burning Steppes through the Redridge Mountains.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Trade Baron Silversnap at Bogpaddle in the Swamp of Sorrows.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Bogpaddle, $c. I fully expect you will enjoy all our facility has to offer.
